english.segment1: Yeah, He's in the buildin'. The Greatest Entertainer on earth, y'all ready
english.segment2: Jesus You're the star of the show. Eh yo, eh eh eh, eh eh eh. Yeah, eh, eh eh, eh yo. Jesus You're the star of the show
english.segment3: The arena is jammed, man. Packed with a sea of fans. Everybody wanna get a glimpse. They wanna see the man
english.segment4: I ain't talkin' 'bout the king of pop. I'm talkin' 'bout the King of Kings. He 'bout to show us somethin'. Something we ain't never seen
english.segment5: I'm in his Entourage, I ain't talkin' HBO. I'm talkin' real life, I follow everywhere He go. I'm taking megastar, yep, there's nobody hotter. His name is Jesus Christ, He's the show stopper
english.segment6: Ey oh, the crowd is gettin' out of control. Turn these lights up and let's go. On my intro give me something Pyro. Eh, eh, eh, eh
english.segment7: Ey oh, the speakers are 'bout to blow. Let's get this party started, let's go. I can hear the praise from way back stage. It's like a parade, you already know. Jesus is the star of the show
english.segment8: Jesus You're the star, Jesus You're the star. Jesus You're the star of the show. Jesus You're the star, Jesus You're the star. Jesus You're the star of the show
english.segment9: I'm just a roadie, man, I carry His word. I do His sound checks, make sure His voice is heard. I throw His name around, they put me in the VIP. And when I drive His car around, everybody wanna roll with me
english.segment10: He's the greatest entertainer that ever hit the stage. I'm rehearsin' all His moves wanna be like Him one day. He's waitin' backstage, waitin' for the right time. When He's comes in the room, He's gonna blow your mind
english.segment11: Ey oh, the crowd is gettin' out of control. Turn these lights up and let's go. On my intro give me something Pyro. Eh, eh, eh, eh
english.segment12: The speakers are 'bout to blow. Lets get this party started let's go. I can hear the praise from way backstage. It's like a parade, you already know. Jesus is the star of the show
english.segment13: Let's set this atmosphere. Before He appears, oh yeah
english.segment14: Jesus You're the star, Jesus You're the star. Jesus You're the star of the show. Jesus You're the star, Jesus You're the star. Jesus You're the star of the show
